attributes.action: BANK OF ENGLAND BAIL US OUT TOO
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have our mortgage with 'Northern Rock'. They are, it is reported, ripe for a take over. If this happens will our mortgage debt be 'written off'? 
NO OF COURSE NOT!

I smell double standards, and this is 'so' unfair. 

As a home owner, if I didn't pay my mortgage, I'd eventually have my home repossessed - YES?
Yet if a 'company', like Northern Rock, for example, falls to pay their debts, the company goes into 'liquidation' and the debt is 'WRITTEN OFF', or.... the Bank of England step in to help them - Why is this? 

My request is for the government to either put a stop to the 'Bank of England' bailing these company's out, unless they are willing to offer the same help to the 'home owner' when he/she falls into the same trap - that's a fair request, isn't it?

Wouldn't it be nice if..... when company's like 'Northern Rock' do go into 'liquidation' or are 'taken over' by another company, we, as the home owner have our mortgages written off! - Ahhh, I can dream!

UNFAIR DOUBLE STANDARDS METHINKS!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
